azurerm_machine_learning_workspace.description: Manages a Azure Machine Learning Workspace.

name.description: Specifies the name of the Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

resource_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the Resource Group in which the Machine Learning Workspace should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

location.description: Specifies the supported Azure location where the Machine Learning Workspace should exist. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

application_insights_id.description: The ID of the Application Insights associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

key_vault_id.description: The ID of key vault associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

storage_account_id.description: The ID of the Storage Account associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
storage_account_id.notes: The `account_tier` cannot be `Premium` in order to associate the Storage Account to this Machine Learning Workspace.

container_registry_id.description: The ID of the container registry associated with this Machine Learning Workspace. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.
container_registry_id.notes: The `admin_enabled` should be `true` in order to associate the Container Registry to this Machine Learning Workspace.

description.description: The description of this Machine Learning Workspace.

discovery_url.description: The URL for the discovery service to identify regional endpoints for machine learning experimentation services.

friendly_name.description: Friendly name for this Machine Learning Workspace.

sku_name.description: SKU/edition of the Machine Learning Workspace, possible values are `Basic` for a basic workspace or `Enterprise` for a feature rich workspace. Defaults to `Basic`.

tags.description: A mapping of tags to assign to the resource. Changing this forces a new resource to be created.

type.description: The Type of Identity which should be used for this Disk Encryption Set. At this time the only possible value is `SystemAssigned`.

id.description: The ID of the Machine Learning Workspace.

principal_id.description: The (Client) ID of the Service Principal.

tenant_id.description: The ID of the Tenant the Service Principal is assigned in.

create.description: Used when creating the Machine Learning Workspace.

update.description: Used when updating the Machine Learning Workspace.

read.description: Used when retrieving the Machine Learning Workspace.

delete.description: Used when deleting the Machine Learning Workspace.
